ygData.subject: Hiya
ygData.msgSnippet: And it s cool to see this list actually get some use.  :-) I m Alex, a 31-year-old webmaster (yes, another IT person) in Seattle (at least, for now...) who
ygData.messageBody:
And it's cool to see this list actually get some use. :-)

I'm Alex, a 31-year-old webmaster (yes, another IT person) in Seattle (at
least, for now...) who plays a Dark Elf Necromancer on The Rathe (and might
be starting another on Rallos Zek to play in the Straylight Saga, and see
what PvP is actually like with decent RPers).

The whole gender/sex thing has NOT come up on The Rathe - but then, T.R.
seems to be a very, very laid-back server (at least in Neriak/Nektulos).

I'm slowly converting the rest of my department to playing EQ, specifically
Dark Elves...so we'll band together in a few weeks and start terrorizing the
rest of the server. ;-)

If anyone's on, give me a /tell (character name Skarrin, of course). The
character hates all non-D.Es...*I*, however, am FAR more civil. ;-)

Alex
